= What is the latest version of live acquisition Registry Decoder? =

1.0

= What Operating Systems are supported? =

The 32 and 64 bit versions of:
Windows XP, Vista, and 7 

Notes: 

If you use pre-compiled binaries, you must choose the one for the architecture (32/64) of the machine you wish to target.

Please see the instructions file in our downloads section for caveats related to acquisition of each supported target

= How can I learn how to use Registry Decoder? =

For basic usage help, you can read our instructions guide, and for more advanced usage and hands-on training, please see our private [http://www.digitalforensicssolutions.com/registrydecoder/content/training training options].
